item.title: AnsibleFest 2019 Thoughts
item.description: AnsibleFest 2019 Thoughts I attended the Ansible conference again this year, and it didn't disappoint. Almost every session I sat in showcased deep technical content presented by seasoned engineers. Many of them are folks in the field without any corporate sponsorship or agenda. Just techies solving difficult problems using modern automation tooling, which is exactly what I look for in a conference. Here are the most interesting topics I took from the conference.
